get.summary: List analysis datasets.
get.description: Return a list of associated analysis datasets.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include flags to specify what is included in the response

parameters.name: analysisRunId
parameters.description: Optional parameter. Set to filter the analysis datasets list and only include analysis datasets associated with the provided analysis runs.

parameters.name: tenantIds
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to limit the response to be with in provided tenant ids
Comma separated to support multiple tenant ids

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to include in a page. Value must be an integer between 1 and 1000. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page offset descriptor. Valid page tokens are included in the response. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies the order to include list items as "_{fieldName}_ [asc|desc]". The second field is optional and specifies the sort direction ("asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending).

default.description: Unexpected issue. Try your request again. If problem persists, contact the system administrator.

CreateSequencingRunConfigurationRequest.description: Request to create a sequencing run configuration

instrumentType.description:
Type of instrument for which the run is planned
Recognized values include:
iSeq100, MiniSeq,
MiSeq, MiSeqDx,
NextSeq, NextSeqDx,
HiSeq1000, HiSeq1500, HiSeq2000, HiSeq2500, HiSeq3000, HiSeq4000, HiSeqX
NovaSeq5000, NovaSeq6000.

instrumentPlatform.description:
Platform of instrument for which the run is planned
Recognized values include:
NextSeq, HiSeq, MiSeq, Eco, iScan, HiSeqX, NeoPrep, MiniSeq, NovaSeq, iSeq, TruSightNIPT, NextSeq1k2k
No value entered is treated as the instrument platform of input InstrumentType

runName.description:
Name of the run
Must not be null, empty, or consist only of white-space characters

regulatoryMode.description: Regulatory mode of the run, default is RUO

numCyclesRead1.description:
Number of cycles in read 1 
Must not be a negative value

numCyclesRead2.description:
Number of cycles in read 2
Must not be a negative value

numCyclesIndex1.description:
Number of cycles in index 1
Must not be a negative value

numCyclesIndex2.description:
Number of cycles in index 2
Must not be a negative value

useCustomPrimerForRead1.description: Value indicating whether read 1 uses custom primer

useCustomPrimerForRead2.description: Value indicating whether read 2 uses custom primer

useCustomPrimerForIndex1.description: Value indicating whether index 1 uses custom primer.

useCustomPrimerForIndex2.description: A value indicating whether index 2 uses custom primer

inputContainerIdentifier.description: Input container identifier for planned run

UpdateLibraryPoolRequest.description: Request to update a library pool

name.description: Name of the library pool. This field is case-insensitive.

libraryIds.description: IDs of libraries in the pool

UpdateLibraryPrepKitRequest.description: Request to update a library prep kit

name.description: Name of the library prep kit

displayName.description: User-friendly name of the library prep kit

organization.description: Organization from where the library prep kit originated (e.g. Illumina)

description.description: Description of the library prep kit

allowedReadTypes.description: Reads types allowed for the library prep kit

items.description:
Defines the read type used for the sequencing run. 
Illumina offers two read types: single-read sequencing and paired-end sequencing

isApplicationSpecific.description: Whether the library prep kit is application specific

indexAdapterKitIds.description: Array of index adapter kit IDs that are compatible with the library prep kit

force.description: Set to true to force update even when the kit is in use

name.description: Name of the library. This field is case-insensitive.

libraryPrepKitId.description: ID of the library prep kit used to prepare the library

indexAdapterKitId.description: ID of the index kit used to prepare the library

indexContainerPosition.description: The container position (well or plate+well position) for the library that is using an index adapter kit with fixed index position

name.description: Name of the sample. This field is case-insensitive.

status.description: Status of the sample in the lab process

labStatus.description: User-customizable value that indicates the status of the sample

projectName.description:
ProjectName. This field is case-insensitive.
Note: This field is an alias of DataAggregationGroup field until DataAggregationGroups is deprecated.

analysisVersionDefinitionId.description: The ID of the analysis version definition on which this analysis configuration is based

settings.description: User-provided analysis-level settings for this analysis configuration (validated against the analysis version definition)

sampleSettings.description:
User provided per-sample settings for this analysis configuration
These must follow the schema described in the analysis version definition

UpdateSequencingRunConfigurationRequest.description: Request to update sequencing run configuration

runName.description:
Name of the run
Must not be null, empty, or consist only of white-space characters

instrumentType.description: Type of instrument for which the run is planned

instrumentPlatform.description:
Platform of instrument for which the run is planned
Recognized values include:
NextSeq, HiSeq, MiSeq, Eco, iScan, HiSeqX, NeoPrep, MiniSeq, NovaSeq, iSeq, TruSightNIPT, NextSeq1k2k
No value entered is treated as the instrument platform of input InstrumentType

useCustomPrimerForRead1.description: Value indicating whether read 1 uses custom primer

useCustomPrimerForRead2.description: Value indicating whether read 2 uses custom primer

useCustomPrimerForIndex1.description: Value indicating whether index 1 uses custom primer

useCustomPrimerForIndex2.description: Value indicating whether index 2 uses custom primer

UpdateSequencingRunContentsRequest.description: Request to update the contents of a sequencing run

allowIndexUpdates.description: Indicates whether updating indexes is allowed

UpdateSequencingRunRequest.description:
Request to update an existing sequencing run resource. Metadata update must follow these rules:
(1) If the run originates from instrument, metadata update is not permitted after instrument run starts.
(2) If the run originates from upload, metadata update is not permitted after upload starts.
(3) If the run is locked, metadata update is only permitted by the user who locked the run.
Note that Description update is not constrained by these rules.

runName.description:
User-provided name of the experiment/run
Not guaranteed to be unique for either request token or system
If null or undefined, existing value is left as is
Any other non-null values are used to update the RunName field of the run
This property is considered metadata, and is restricted by metadata update rules

description.description:
User-provided description of the experiment/run
If null or undefined, existing value is left as is
Any other non-null values are used to update the RunName field of the run
This property is NOT considered metadata, and is not restricted by metadata update rules
If the run is locked, description may only be updated by the user who locked the run

flowCellBarcode.description:
The barcode of the FlowCell used in the sequencing run.
If null or undefined, existing value is left as is
Any other non-null values are used to update the RunName field of the run
This property is considered metadata, and is restricted by metadata update rules

inputContainerIdentifier.description: Input container identifier used in the sequencing run

consumables.description:
Information (such as barcodes) of the consumables (such as reagents, buffers, ...) used in the sequencing run.
If null or undefined, existing value is left as is
Any other non-null values are used to update the RunName field of the run
This property is considered metadata, and is restricted by metadata update rules

sampleSheetName.description:
Name of the sample sheet file
If null or undefined, existing value is left as is
Any other non-null values are used to update the RunName field of the run
This property is considered metadata, and is restricted by metadata update rules

isFavorite.description: Set the run as favorite runs

verificationStatus.description: Verification status updated while the stage is completing

instrumentRunStatus.description: Instrument run status updated by the instrument control software while the stage is completing

instrumentRunStatusSummary.description: Detailed summary of instrument run status provided by instrument

instrumentAnalysisStatus.description: Instrument analysis status updated by the instrument control software while the stage is completing

instrumentAnalysisStatusSummary.description: Detailed summary of instrument analysis status provided by instrument

uploadStatusSummary.description: Detailed summary of upload progress provided by instrument

instrumentAnalysisProgress.description: Progress of the instrument analysis stage

needsAttention.description: True if the run should be marked as needing attention for user, false otherwise

needsAttentionReason.description: Reason why the run needs attention

workflowType.description:
Workflow type
We always force it to be nextflow for now

volumeSizeInGigabytes.description: The volume size limitation for the analysis output

tags.description: A JSON object that can be used to pass metadata to the workflow

workflowParams.description:
Workflow parameters with key/value pairs
A JSON object that allows the definition to provide hard coded parameters to the workflow
These get merged with the parameters provided to the workflow via user settings

workflowResourcesFolder.description: Optional resources folder configured for the workflow

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
